column4: hi every1, I don't know where my System > Preferences > Desktop Effects ... is. It's not there in the menu, Does any one know how to bring it back? THANK YOU.
you can always reinstall it with:  sudo apt-get install dekstop-effects
you can always reinstall it with:  sudo apt-get install dekstop-effects
did you uninstall the whole fusion package first?  Otherwise they like to argue
